welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Asheboro! A charming city known for its rich history and natural beauty. We invite you to explore and discover all that Asheboro has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Piedmont Triad International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Piedmont Triad International Airport primarily serves American Airlines and its regional partners.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Piedmont Triad International Airport primarily serves Delta Air Lines and its regional partners.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Piedmont Triad International Airport primarily serves United Airlines and its regional partners.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the network and agreeing to the terms and conditions.
